item.title: My Jerusalem Design Week Web App
item.description: Reflection on Jerusalem Design Week 2023 (22-29.6) Link to heading “Nothing happens twice. That’s why we were born without any preparation. And we will die without routine.” - Wis≈Çawa Szymborska Banknotes are a symbol from the beginning of civilization and accompany us even further. What would happen if everyone issued their own value? Yonatan Assouline, Ben Drusinsky and I got the opportunity to work on this experiment for the Jerusalem Design Week 2023 (JDW) - https://lnkd.
